summary: This is an email chain from March 3, 2021, between Assistant U.S. Attorney M and French individuals Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay, arranging a meeting to discuss the ongoing SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell. The prosecutors are seeking to speak with Cassart and Boulay as part of their investigation.

persons.name: Nicolas Cassart
persons.context: Recipient of the initial email from AUSA M, who coordinates with his partner Nicolas Boulay to schedule a meeting with the SDNY prosecutors regarding the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

persons.name: Nicolas Boulay
persons.context: Copied on the email chain, identified as Cassart's partner, and included in the proposed meeting with SDNY prosecutors about the Epstein/Maxwell case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the ongoing federal investigation being conducted by the SDNY prosecutors.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the subject of the ongoing prosecution being handled by the SDNY prosecutors alongside the Epstein investigation.

connections.description: AUSA M is reaching out to Nicolas Cassart to schedule a call as part of the SDNY's investigation into Epstein and prosecution of Maxwell.
Cassart refers to Boulay as "my partner" and includes him in coordinating the meeting with SDNY prosecutors.
Boulay is copied on the emails and is included as a participant in the proposed meeting with SDNY prosecutors regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case.
Both are named together as the subjects of the ongoing SDNY investigation and prosecution.

events.title: SDNY prosecutors contact French individuals
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney M emails Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay to arrange a call regarding the Epstein investigation and Maxwell prosecution.

events.title: Proposed meeting with Cassart and Boulay
events.description: A call is scheduled for Friday, March 5, 2021, at 17:00 (European time) between SDNY prosecutors and Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: In March 2021, the SDNY was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and prosecuting Ghislaine Maxwell, reaching out to international contacts.
The prosecutors sought to speak with two French individuals, Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay, suggesting they may have relevant information.
The email chain shows coordination to schedule a virtual meeting (WebEx or Teams) between the U.S. attorneys and the French contacts.
The document indicates the investigation was ongoing and expanding to include foreign individuals over a year after Epstein's death.
The correspondence is professional and focused on scheduling, with no details disclosed about the specific information sought from Cassart and Boulay.
